snippet: Tina Maze of Slovenia rebounded from her World Cup slalom title loss to Mikaela Shiffrin by ending her season with a giant slalom win in Lenzerheide, Switzerland.
abstract: Slovenian skier Tina Maze wins World Cup giant slalom in Lenzerheide, Switzerland; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze of Slovenia rebounded from her World Cup slalom title loss to Mikaela Shiffrin by ending her season with a giant slalom win in Lenzerheide, Switzerland.

headline.seo: Tina Maze Bounces Back to Win Giant Slalom
headline.main: Maze Bounces Back to Win Giant Slalom
